summary: The gang teams up with a fighter to break up a fight-fixing racket.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Gabriel Dell|Frankie Darro|Lyle Talbot|William 'Billy' Benedict|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Bert Conway|Evelyn Eaton|Bernard Gorcey|Teddy Infuhr|Ben Welden|Dorothy Vaughan|Sam Hayes|Bill Cartledge|Paul Maxey|Stanley Andrews|Fred Aldrich|Larry Anzalone|Al Bain|Phil Bloom|Willie Bloom|Chet Brandenburg|John Breen|Gene Delmont|Mike Donovan|Johnny Duncan|Roland Dupree|Bennie Goldberg|Buddy Gorman|Meyer Grace|Joe Gray|Joe Greb|Eddie Gribbon|Frank Hagney|Bert Hanlon|Sam Harris|John Indrisano|Tom Kennedy|Johnny Kern|Mike Lally|Sam LaMarr|Jimmy Lennon Sr.|Martin Mason|Frank Moran|Jack Mower|Jimmy O'Gatty|Ralph Peters|Eddie Rio|Charles Sherlock|Carl Sklover|Charles Sullivan|Don Turner|Anthony Warde|Robert Wolcott
title: Fighting Fools
